select "id" from "t_order" where "t_order"."id"=10
SELECT current_timestamp
SELECT t_order.* FROM t_order t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT t_order.order_id,t_order.user_id,status FROM t_order t_order WHERE t_order.user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE item_id <> ? ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE item_id != ? ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE item_id IS NOT NULL AND item_id NOT IN (?, ?) ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE item_id IS NOT NULL AND item_id NOT BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
select * from t_order where user_id = ? and order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id IN (?, ?, ?) AND order_id IN (?, ?) ORDER BY user_id, order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id BETWEEN ? AND ? AND order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY user_id, order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id >= ? AND user_id <= ? AND order_id >= ? AND order_id <= ? ORDER BY user_id, order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id IN (?, ?) AND order_id IN (?, ?) ORDER BY order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE is_deleted = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_order WHERE (user_id = ? AND status LIKE ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_order WHERE status LIKE ? escape '!' limit ? offset ?
SELECT count(0) AS orders_count FROM t_order o WHERE o.status LIKE CONCAT('%%', ?, '%%') AND o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT count(0) AS orders_count FROM t_order o WHERE o.status LIKE CONCAT('%%', ?, '%%') AND o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?
select id from admin where fullname like 'a%'
SELECT count(0) as orders_count FROM t_order o WHERE o.status ~~ CONCAT('%%', ?, '%%') AND o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY i.item_id
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id ORDER BY i.item_id

SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id JOIN t_broadcast_table c ON o.status = c.status WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? AND o.status = ? ORDER BY i.item_id

SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id JOIN `select` c ON o.status = c.status WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? AND o.status = ? ORDER BY i.item_id

SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id JOIN "select" c ON o.status = c.status WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? AND c.status = ? ORDER BY i.item_id

SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id JOIN [select] c ON o.status = c.status WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? AND c.status = ? ORDER BY i.item_id
SELECT length.item_id password FROM t_order_item length where length.item_id = ?
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o FORCE INDEX(order_index) JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id=i.order_id WHERE o.order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE rule = ?::jsonb AND start_point=ST_GeographyFromText('SRID=4326;POINT('||?||' '||?||')') AND user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE rule IN (?::jsonb, ?::jsonb) AND start_point=ST_GeographyFromText('SRID=4326;POINT('||?||' '||?||')') AND user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE rule BETWEEN ?::jsonb AND ?::jsonb AND start_point=ST_GeographyFromText('SRID=4326;POINT('||?||' '||?||')') AND order_id = ?

SELECT sum(if(status=0, 1, 0)) func_status FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT INTERVAL(status,1,5) func_status FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?

SELECT DATABASE()
SELECT QUARTER('2008-04-01')

SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE DATE_FORMAT(current_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = '2019-12-18'
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(113.358772, 23.1273723), POINT(user_id,order_id)) != 0
SELECT CURRENT_USER

SELECT * FROM t_order FOR UPDATE

SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE JSON_VALUE(items, '$.name' RETURNING VARCHAR(100)) = 'jack'
SELECT CONVERT(SUBSTRING(content, 5) , SIGNED) AS signed_content FROM t_order WHERE order_id = 1

select sequence_name, sequence_catalog, sequence_schema, convert( bigint, start_value ) as start_value, convert( bigint, minimum_value ) as minimum_value, convert( bigint, maximum_value ) as maximum_value, convert( bigint, increment ) as increment from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.SEQUENCES

SELECT CONVERT(DECIMAL(10, 5), CONVERT(VARBINARY(20), @myval))

SELECT CONVERT(XML, '<root> <child/> </root>', 1)

SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(8), 0x4E616d65, 1) AS [Style 1, binary to character]
SELECT CONVERT(BINARY(4), '0x4E616D65', 1) AS [Style 1, character to binary]

SELECT * FROM tb_content_json WHERE content_json::json->>'nation'='CHINA'
SELECT content_json::json#>'{keyword,1}' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::json#>>'{keyword,1}' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb@>'{&title&:&abc&}'::jsonb FROM tb_content_json
SELECT '{&title&:&abc&}'::jsonb<@content_json::jsonb FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb?'title' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb?|array['title','nation'] FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb?&array['title','nation'] FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb||'{"price":999}'::jsonb FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb-'title' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb#-'{title}' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb @?'$.keyword[*]?(@=="ss")' FROM tb_content_json
SELECT content_json::jsonb@@'$.keyword[*]=="ss"' FROM tb_content_json

SELECT CAST(order_id AS UNSIGNED),user_id FROM t_order
SELECT user_id,CAST(order_id AS SIGNED INT) FROM t_order
SELECT CAST(order_id AS UNSIGNED INT),user_id FROM t_order
SELECT user_id,CAST(order_id AS SIGNED INTEGER) FROM t_order
SELECT CAST(order_id AS UNSIGNED INTEGER),user_id FROM t_order
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department_id = 30 ORDER BY last_name

SELECT a.department_id "Department", a.num_emp/b.total_count "%_Employees", a.sal_sum/b.total_sal "%_Salary" FROM (SELECT department_id, COUNT(*) num_emp, SUM(salary) sal_sum FROM employees GROUP BY department_id) a, (SELECT COUNT(*) total_count, SUM(salary) total_sal FROM employees) b ORDER BY a.department_id
SELECT * FROM sales PARTITION (sales_q2_2000) s WHERE s.amount_sold > 1500 ORDER BY cust_id, time_id, channel_id
SELECT last_name, job_id, departments.department_id, department_name FROM employees, departments WHERE employees.department_id = departments.department_id ORDER BY last_name, job_id
SELECT * FROM employees e, LATERAL(SELECT * FROM departments d WHERE e.department_id = d.department_id)
SELECT * FROM CONTAINERS(employees)
SELECT last_name, employee_id, manager_id FROM employees CONNECT BY employee_id = manager_id ORDER BY last_name
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE time = CURRENT_TIME
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE time = CURRENT_TIME()

SELECT country, prod, year, s FROM sales_view_ref MODEL PARTITION BY (country) DIMENSION BY (prod, year) MEASURES (sale s) IGNORE NAV UNIQUE DIMENSION RULES UPSERT SEQUENTIAL ORDER (s[prod='Mouse Pad', year=2001] = s['Mouse Pad', 1999] + s['Mouse Pad', 2000], s['Standard Mouse', 2002] = s['Standard Mouse', 2001]) ORDER BY country, prod, year

SELECT country, year, sale, csum FROM (SELECT country, year, SUM(sale) sale FROM sales_view_ref GROUP BY country, year) MODEL DIMENSION BY (country, year) MEASURES (sale, 0 csum) RULES (csum[any, any] = SUM(sale) OVER (PARTITION BY country ORDER BY year ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING)) ORDER BY country, year

SELECT SUBSTR(country,1,20) country, SUBSTR(prod,1,15) prod, year, sales FROM sales_view WHERE country='Italy' MODEL RETURN UPDATED ROWS PARTITION BY (country) DIMENSION BY (prod, year) MEASURES (sale sales) RULES (sales[FOR prod in ('Mouse Pad', 'Bounce', 'Y Box'), 2005] = 1.3 * sales[cv(prod), 2001]) ORDER BY country, prod, year

SELECT SUBSTR(country,1,20) country, year, localsales, dollarsales FROM sales_view WHERE country IN ('Canada', 'Brazil') GROUP BY country, year MODEL RETURN UPDATED ROWS REFERENCE conv_refmodel ON (SELECT country, exchange_rate AS er FROM dollar_conv) DIMENSION BY (country) MEASURES (er) IGNORE NAV MAIN main_model DIMENSION BY (country, year) MEASURES (SUM(sale) sales, 0 localsales, 0 dollarsales) IGNORE NAV RULES (localsales['Canada', 2005] = sales[cv(country), 2001] * 1.22, dollarsales['Canada', 2005] = sales[cv(country), 2001] * 1.22 * conv_refmodel.er['Canada'], localsales['Brazil', 2005] = sales[cv(country), 2001] * 1.34, dollarsales['Brazil', 2005] = sales['Brazil', 2001] * 1.34 * er['Brazil'])

SELECT year, sales FROM sales_view WHERE country='Italy' AND prod='Bounce' MODEL DIMENSION BY (year) MEASURES (sale sales) RULES SEQUENTIAL ORDER (sales[ANY] ORDER BY year DESC = sales[cv(year)-1]) ORDER BY year

SELECT country, product, year, s FROM sales_view MODEL DIMENSION BY (country, product, year) MEASURES (sales s) IGNORE NAV RULES UPSERT (s[FOR (country, product, year) IN (SELECT DISTINCT 'new_country', product, year FROM sales_view WHERE country = 'Poland')] = s['Poland',CV(),CV()]) ORDER BY country, year, product
-- begin comments SELECT * FROM # middle comments t_order; -- end comments

SELECT order_id_value,order_item_id_value FROM (select 1001 as order_id_value, 100001 as order_item_id_value from dual) MODEL RETURN UPDATED ROWS DIMENSION BY(order_item_id_value) MEASURES(order_id_value) RULES(order_id_value[1] = 10001)
SELECT order_id FROM t_order WHERE user_id = $2 AND order_id = $1 OR user_id = $2
select position(binary 'll' in 'hello'),position('a' in binary 'hello')

SELECT sharding_db.t_order.order_id FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT order_id FROM public.t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT order_id FROM sharding_db.public.t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT _code,_a FROM t_order
SELECT T.USER_NO FROM T_RATION_INFO T
SELECT _binary 'abc' as a
SELECT o.order_id, o.status, i.item_id FROM t_order o INNER JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id FOR XML AUTO
SELECT user_id, status FROM t_order WHERE order_id = 1 FOR XML RAW, ELEMENTS XSINIL
SELECT order_id, status FROM t_order FOR JSON AUTO, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES
SELECT m.target FROM sys_menu m
SELECT m.maxvalue FROM sys_menu m
SELECT m.priority FROM sys_menu m
WITH XMLNAMESPACES ('uri' AS ns1) SELECT order_id AS 'ns1:order_id', status AS 'ns1:status' FROM t_order FOR XML RAW ('ns1:order'), ELEMENTS
WITH XMLNAMESPACES ('uri1' AS ns1, 'uri2' AS ns2, DEFAULT 'uri2') SELECT order_id AS 'ns1:order_id', status AS 'ns1:status' FROM t_order FOR XML RAW ('ns1:order'), ELEMENTS XSINIL
SELECT MYSQL_MAIN,UTC_DATE,UTC_TIME,UTC_TIMESTAMP FROM test
SELECT order_id, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY order_id DESC) AS row_number FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ?

SELECT LISTAGG(c.category_name, '/') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY LENGTH (c."level") DESC) AS category_level FROM t_product_category c START WITH c.category_id = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR c.parent_id = c.category_id
SELECT PERCENT_RANK(15000, .05) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary, commission_pct) 'Percent-Rank' FROM employees;
SELECT department_id, last_name, salary, PERCENT_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY department_id ORDER BY salary DESC) AS pr FROM employees ORDER BY pr, salary, last_name;
SELECT department_id, PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary DESC) 'Median cont' FROM employees;

SELECT department_id, last_name, salary, PERCENTILE_DISC(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary DESC) OVER (PARTITION BY department_id) 'Percentile_Disc' FROM employees WHERE department_id in (30, 60) ORDER BY last_name, salary, department_id;
SELECT CUME_DIST(15500, .05) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary, commission_pct) 'Cume-Dist of 15500' FROM employees;
SELECT RANK(15500) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary DESC) 'Rank of 15500' FROM employees;
SELECT ROWID FROM employees WHERE ROWIDTOCHAR(ROWID) LIKE '%JAAB%' ORDER BY ROWID;

SELECT job_id, employee_id ID, salary, REGR_SLOPE(SYSDATE-hire_date, salary) OVER (PARTITION BY job_id) slope, REGR_INTERCEPT(SYSDATE-hire_date, salary) OVER (PARTITION BY job_id) intcpt, REGR_R2(SYSDATE-hire_date, salary) OVER (PARTITION BY job_id) rsqr, REGR_COUNT(SYSDATE-hire_date, salary) OVER (PARTITION BY job_id) count, REGR_AVGX(SYSDATE-hire_date, salary) OVER (PARTITION BY job_id) avgx, REGR_AVGY(SYSDATE-hire_date, salary) OVER (PARTITION BY job_id) avgy FROM employees WHERE department_id in (50, 80) ORDER BY job_id, employee_id;
SELECT LPAD('Page 1',15,'*.') 'LPAD example' FROM DUAL;
SELECT TO_CHAR(ts_col, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SSxFF') AS ts_col FROM date_tab ORDER BY ts_col;
SELECT XMLELEMENT('Department', XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT('Employee', e.job_id||' '||e.last_name) ORDER BY last_name)) as 'Dept_list' FROM employees e WHERE e.department_id = 30;
SELECT XMLCAST(des.COLUMN_VALUE AS VARCHAR2(256)) FROM purchaseorder;
SELECT XMLCOLATTVAL(e.employee_id AS EVALNAME 'ID', e.last_name AS name, e.salary) 'Emp Element' FROM employees e WHERE employee_id = 204;
SELECT id, XMLEXISTS('//student[@age=20]' PASSING BY VALUE xcol AS x) FROM x_table;
SELECT XMLFOREST(e.employee_id AS EVALNAME 'ID', e.last_name AS name, e.salary) FROM employees e WHERE employee_id = 204;
SELECT XMLPARSE(DOCUMENT 'DEPTXML' WELLFORMED) AS dept FROM DUAL;
SELECT XMLPI(NAME "Order analysisComp", 'imported, reconfigured, disassembled') AS 'XMLPI' FROM DUAL;
SELECT XMLQUERY('//student[@age=20]' PASSING BY VALUE xcol AS x RETURNING CONTENT NULL ON EMPTY) FROM x_table;
SELECT XMLROOT(XMLType('143598'), VERSION '1.0', STANDALONE YES) AS 'XMLROOT' FROM DUAL;
SELECT XMLSERIALIZE(DOCUMENT c2 AS BLOB ENCODING 'UTF-8' VERSION 'a' INDENT SIZE = 0 SHOW DEFAULTS) FROM b;

SELECT warehouse_name warehouse, warehouse2.Water, warehouse2.Rail FROM warehouses, XMLTABLE('/Warehouse' PASSING warehouses.warehouse_spec COLUMNS "Water" varchar2(6) PATH 'WaterAccess',"Rail" varchar2(6) PATH 'RailAccess') warehouse2;

SELECT wi.code.format(null,'PURE_IDENTITY') as PURE_IDENTITY FROM warehouse_info wi;
SELECT x.xmlcol.isSchemaValid('http://www.example.com/schemas/ipo.xsd','purchaseOrder') FROM po_tab x;
SELECT LAST_VALUE(AGE IGNORE NULLS) OVER (PARTITION BY AGE ORDER BY AGE) from TEST;
SELECT hire_date, LAG(hire_date, 1) OVER (ORDER BY hire_date) AS LAG1, LEAD(hire_date, 1) OVER (ORDER BY hire_date) AS LEAD1 FROM employees WHERE department_id = 30 ORDER BY hire_date;
SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT last_name 'Manager' FROM employees CONNECT BY PRIOR employee_id = manager_id
SELECT NTILE(4) OVER (ORDER BY salary DESC) AS quartile FROM employees WHERE department_id = 100 ORDER BY last_name
SELECT SUM(sales) OVER w AS total_sales FROM orders WINDOW w AS (PARTITION BY region ORDER BY order_id)
SELECT LAG(amount, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY customer_id ORDER BY tx_time ROWS BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 FOLLOWING) AS lag_amt FROM payments
SELECT FIRST_VALUE(price) OVER (ORDER BY created_at) AS first_price FROM product_prices
SELECT NTH_VALUE(score, 2) OVER (ORDER BY score) AS second_score FROM rankings
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
SELECT DATE '2020-01-01'
SELECT 0x1AF
SELECT b'1010'
SELECT 'a' COLLATE utf8mb4_bin
SELECT TRUE
SELECT FALSE
SELECT NULL

SELECT department_id, PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary DESC) 'Median cont', PERCENTILE_DISC(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary DESC) 'Median disc' FROM employees GROUP BY department_id

SELECT salary,MIN(salary) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY commission_pct) OVER (PARTITION BY department_id) 'Worst', MAX(salary) KEEP (DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY commission_pct) OVER (PARTITION BY department_id) 'Best' FROM employees ORDER BY department_id
SELECT employee_id, CORR(SYSDATE - hire_date, salary) FROM employees WHERE department_id in (50, 80) ORDER BY employee_id

select TRIM(' derby '), TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM ' derby '), TRIM(TRAILING ' ' FROM ' derby '), TRIM(cast (null as char(1)) FROM ' derby '), TRIM(' ' FROM cast(null as varchar(30))), TRIM('y' FROM ' derby') FROM employees
SELECT TRIM( '.,! ' FROM ' # test .') AS Result
SELECT TRIM(LEADING '.,! ' FROM ' .# test .') AS Result
SELECT TRIM(TRAILING '.,! ' FROM ' .# test .') AS Result
SELECT TRIM(BOTH '123' FROM '123abc123') AS Result
SELECT TO_CHAR(RATIO_TO_REPORT(amount_sold) OVER (), '9.999') AS RATIO_TO_REPORT FROM sales s GROUP BY s.channel_desc
SELECT SYS_XMLAGG(last_name) a, SYS_XMLGEN(last_name) b FROM employees WHERE last_name LIKE 'R%' ORDER BY xmlagg;

SELECT product_id, supplier_id, COVAR_POP(list_price, min_price) OVER (ORDER BY product_id, supplier_id) AS CUM_COVP, COVAR_SAMP(list_price, min_price) OVER (ORDER BY product_id, supplier_id) AS CUM_COVS FROM product_information p WHERE category_id = 29 ORDER BY product_id, supplier_id
SELECT department_id, last_name, salary, PERCENT_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY department_id ORDER BY salary DESC) AS pr FROM employees ORDER BY pr, salary, last_name
SELECT RANK(15500, .05) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY salary, commission_pct) 'Rank' FROM employees

SELECT department_id, first_name, last_name, salary FROM (SELECT department_id, first_name, last_name, salary, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY department_id ORDER BY salary desc) rn FROM employees) WHERE rn = 3 ORDER BY department_id, salary DESC, last_name

SELECT INSERTCHILDXML(warehouse_spec, '/Warehouse/Building', 'Owner', XMLType('<Owner>LesserCo</Owner>')), SYS_DBURIGEN(employee_id, email), INSERTCHILDXMLAFTER(warehouse_spec, '/Warehouse/Building','Owner[2]', XMLType('<Owner>ThirdOwner</Owner>')), INSERTCHILDXMLBEFORE(warehouse_spec, '/Warehouse/Building','Owner[2]', XMLType('<Owner>ThirdOwner</Owner>')), INSERTXMLAFTER(warehouse_spec,'/Warehouse/Building/Owner[1]', XMLType('<Owner>SecondOwner</Owner>')), INSERTXMLBEFORE(warehouse_spec, '/Warehouse/Building/Owner[2]', XMLType('<Owner>ThirdOwner</Owner>')), EXTRACT(warehouse_spec, '/Warehouse/Docks') 'Number of Docks', EXTRACTVALUE(e.warehouse_spec, '/Warehouse/Docks') 'Docks', APPENDCHILDXML(warehouse_spec, 'Warehouse/Building', XMLType('<Owner>Grandco</Owner>')), DELETEXML(warehouse_spec, '/Warehouse/Building/Owner') FROM warehouses WHERE EXISTSNODE(warehouse_spec, '/Warehouse/Docks') = 1 ORDER BY warehouse_id

SELECT XMLCOMMENT('OrderAnalysisComp imported, reconfigured, disassembled'), XMLCONCAT(XMLELEMENT('First', e.first_name), XMLELEMENT('Last', e.last_name)) AS 'Result', XMLPATCH(XMLTYPE('xml')), XMLDIFF(XMLTYPE('xml'),XMLTYPE('xml2')), XMLELEMENT('Emp', XMLATTRIBUTES(e.employee_id, e.last_name)), XMLSEQUENCE(EXTRACT(warehouse_spec, '/Warehouse/*')) FROM DUAL
SELECT o.item.line_item_id, o.item.quantity FROM short_orders o;
SELECT VALUE(p) FROM warehouses w, TABLE(XMLSEQUENCE(EXTRACT(warehouse_spec, '/Warehouse/*'))) p;
select cfg_name from bmsql_config group by cfg_name having cfg_name='1';
SELECT TO_DATE('Febuary 15, 2016, 11:00 A.M.' DEFAULT 'January 01, 2016 12:00 A.M.' ON CONVERSION ERROR, 'Month dd, YYYY, HH:MI A.M.') FROM DUAL;

SELECT ((a.enddate - term + term2 + 1) / (last_day(term) - term + 1)) cnt, a.empid FROM employee a WHERE nvl(disabled, 0) = 1 AND enddate BETWEEN term AND last_day(term) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM post d WHERE a.orgid = d.orgid AND a.postid = d.postid AND d.title != 'TEST' AND nvl(d.postid, 0) != 0)
SELECT COUNT(empid) FROM EMPLOYEE b, custom_function(b.orgid) a WHERE a.postid = b.postid
SELECT 5! AS RESULT;
select custom_concat(distinct a.P1) From TEST a;
SELECT u'test', U'test' from DUAL
SELECT TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(DISTINCT TEST_ID) OVER(PARTITION BY TEST_ID)) ID FROM TEST_TABLE
SELECT WM_CONCAT(NAME) NAME FROM TEST_TABLE
SELECT REPLACE(WM_CONCAT(NAME),',','|') FROM TEST_TABLE
SELECT NAME,WM_CONCAT(DECODE(SUBSTR((TO_CHAR(NAME)),0,1),'.','0'||TO_CHAR(NAME),TO_CHAR(NAME))) WM_NAME FROM TEST_TABLE WHERE NAME ='TEST' GROUP BY NAME
SELECT column_name, updatable FROM user_updatable_columns WHERE table_name = 'LOCATIONS_VIEW' ORDER BY column_name, updatable
SELECT x.$(ColumnName) FROM Person.Person x WHERE x.BusinessEntityID > 5
SELECT name, server_id, provider FROM sys.servers
SELECT COUNT(*) AS [Number of rows] FROM #Test

SELECT obj1.name AS [XEvent-name], col2.name AS [XEvent-column], obj1.description AS [Descr-name], col2.description AS [Descr-column] FROM sys.dm_xe_objects AS obj1 INNER JOIN sys.dm_xe_object_columns AS col2 ON col2.object_name = obj1.name ORDER BY obj1.name, col2.name

SELECT query = a.text, start_time, percent_complete, eta = dateadd(second,estimated_completion_time/1000, getdate()) FROM sys.dm_exec_requests r CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(r.sql_handle) a WHERE r.command = 'RESTORE DATABASE'
SELECT TOP 10 * FROM TableName
SELECT TOP 10 columnName FROM TableName;
SELECT TOP 10 alias1.columnName from TableName alias1
SELECT TOP 10 WITH TIES alias1.columnName from TableName alias1

SELECT OBJECT_NAME(object_id) AS referencing_object_name,COALESCE(COL_NAME(object_id, column_id), '(n/a)') AS referencing_column_name,* FROM sys.sql_dependencies WHERE referenced_major_id = OBJECT_ID('<schema_name.table_name>') ORDER BY OBJECT_NAME(object_id), COL_NAME(object_id, column_id)

SELECT name AS view_name,SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id) AS schema_name,OBJECTPROPERTYEX(object_id,'IsIndexed') AS IsIndexed,OBJECTPROPERTYEX(object_id,'IsIndexable') AS IsIndexable,create_date,modify_date FROM sys.views
SELECT ProductID, Name, ProductNumber FROM [Production].[Product] WHERE SUBSTRING(ProductNumber, 0, 4) = 'HN-'
SELECT * FROM #SampleTempTable WHERE id IS NOT DISTINCT FROM NULL
SELECT * FROM #SampleTempTable WHERE id IS DISTINCT FROM 17;
SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE CONTAINS(product_description, '"Snap Happy 100EZ" OR FORMSOF(THESAURUS,"Snap Happy") OR "100EZ"') AND product_cost < 200
SELECT has_backup_checksums, database_name, * FROM msdb..backupset
select * from table(dbms_xplan.display);
SELECT name, size / 128.0 - CAST(FILEPROPERTY(name, 'SpaceUsed') AS INT) / 128.0 AS AvailableSpaceInMB FROM sys.database_files
SELECT TRIM( ' test ') AS Result
SELECT * FROM ##test
SELECT TOP 100 id=CAST(_id as VARBINARY(1000)) FROM OPENROWSET('CosmosDB', 'Your-account;Database=your-database;Key=your-key',HTAP) WITH (_id VARCHAR(1000)) as HTAP
SELECT candidate_name,SSN FROM candidates WHERE CONTAINS(candidate_resume, '"SQL Server"') AND candidate_division = 'DBA'
SELECT 'DECLARE @serverName NVARCHAR(512) = N''' + value + '''' FROM sys.dm_hadr_fabric_config_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'DnsRecordName'
SELECT page_count, compressed_page_count, forwarded_record_count, * FROM sys.dm_db_index_physical_stats(db_id(), object_id('t3'), NULL, NULL, 'SAMPLED')
SELECT backup_size/compressed_backup_size FROM msdb..backupset
SELECT file_id, name, type_desc, physical_name, size, max_size FROM sys.database_files

SELECT [req].[session_id],[req].[start_time],[req].[cpu_time] AS [cpu_time_ms],OBJECT_NAME([ST].[objectid], [ST].[dbid]) AS [ObjectName],SUBSTRING(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([ST].[text], ([req].[statement_start_offset] / 2) + 1, ((CASE [req].[statement_end_offset] WHEN -1 THEN DATALENGTH([ST].[text]) ELSE [req].[statement_end_offset] END - [req].[statement_start_offset]) / 2) + 1 ), CHAR(10), ' ' ), CHAR(13), ' ' ), 1, 512 ) AS [statement_text] FROM [sys].[dm_exec_requests] AS [req] CROSS APPLY [sys].dm_exec_sql_text([req].[sql_handle]) AS [ST] ORDER BY [req].[cpu_time] DESC

SELECT {[Measures].[Internet Sales Count], [Measures].[Internet Sales-Sales Amount]} ON COLUMNS, {[Product].[Product Line].[Product Line].MEMBERS} ON ROWS FROM [Analysis Services Tutorial] WHERE [Sales Territory].[Sales Territory Country].[Australia]

SELECT name AS column_name,column_id,TYPE_NAME(user_type_id) AS type_name, max_length,CASE WHEN max_length = -1 AND TYPE_NAME(user_type_id) <> 'xml' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS [(max)] FROM sys.columns WHERE object_id=OBJECT_ID('<schema_name.table_name>') AND ( TYPE_NAME(user_type_id) IN ('xml','text', 'ntext','image') OR (TYPE_NAME(user_type_id) IN ('varchar','nvarchar','varbinary') AND max_length = -1))
SELECT Test2Col = x FROM #t
SELECT Person2.name AS FriendName FROM Person Person1, friend, Person Person2 WHERE MATCH(Person1-(friend)->Person2) AND Person1.name = 'Alice';
SELECT Person3.name AS FriendName FROM Person Person1, friend, Person Person2, friend friend2, Person Person3 WHERE MATCH(Person1-(friend)->Person2-(friend2)->Person3) AND Person1.name = 'Alice';

SELECT Person1.name AS Friend1, Person2.name AS Friend2 FROM Person Person1, friend friend1, Person Person2, friend friend2, Person Person0 WHERE MATCH(Person1-(friend1)->Person0 AND Person2-(friend2)->Person0);

SELECT PersonName, Friends FROM (SELECT Person1.name AS PersonName, STRING_AGG(Person2.name, '->') WITHIN GROUP (GRAPH PATH) AS Friends, LAST_VALUE(Person2.name) WITHIN GROUP (GRAPH PATH) AS LastNode FROM Person AS Person1, friendOf FOR PATH AS fo, Person FOR PATH AS Person2 WHERE MATCH(SHORTEST_PATH(Person1(-(fo)->Person2)+)) AND Person1.name = 'Jacob') AS Q WHERE Q.LastNode = 'Alice'

SELECT Person1.name AS PersonName, STRING_AGG(Person2.name, '->') WITHIN GROUP (GRAPH PATH) AS Friends FROM Person AS Person1, friendOf FOR PATH AS fo, Person FOR PATH AS Person2 WHERE MATCH(SHORTEST_PATH(Person1(-(fo)->Person2){1,3})) AND Person1.name = 'Jacob'

SELECT Person1.name AS PersonName, STRING_AGG(Person2.name, '->') WITHIN GROUP (GRAPH PATH) AS Friends, Restaurant.name FROM Person AS Person1, friendOf FOR PATH AS fo, Person FOR PATH AS Person2, likes, Restaurant WHERE MATCH(SHORTEST_PATH(Person1(-(fo)->Person2){1,3}) AND LAST_NODE(Person2)-(likes)->Restaurant ) AND Person1.name = 'Jacob' AND Restaurant.name = 'Ginger and Spice'
select hour from table1
select minute from table1
SELECT pg_get_expr AS CONSTRAINT ,indcollation AS COLLATION FROM pg_index
SELECT * FROM t1 USE INDEX (i1) IGNORE INDEX (i2) USE INDEX (i2);
SELECT * FROM t1 USE INDEX () IGNORE INDEX (i2) USE INDEX (i1) USE INDEX (i2);
SELECT * FROM t1 USE INDEX (i1,i2) IGNORE INDEX (i2);
SELECT * FROM t1 USE INDEX FOR ORDER BY (i1) ORDER BY col1
SELECT * FROM t1 USE INDEX FOR GROUP BY (i1) GROUP BY col1
SELECT * FROM t1 FORCE INDEX FOR ORDER BY (idx1) ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM t1 FORCE INDEX FOR GROUP BY (idx1) GROUP BY id
SELECT * FROM t1 FORCE INDEX FOR JOIN (idx1)
select xxx.condition from xxx
select describe from xxx
SELECT * FROM t_order t WHERE t.CREATE_TIME <= nvl(END_TIME, sysdate) - INTERVAL ? HOUR AND t.STATUS = 'FAILURE'
SELECT NOT 0, NOT 1, NOT 2
SELECT NOT TRUE, NOT FALSE
SELECT order_id, zone FROM t_order
SELECT * FROM t_order o WHERE o.range = 1
SELECT 'x' 'x' 'x'
SELECT 'x' "x" 'x' FROM t_order WHERE status LIKE "%" '123' "%"
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees WHERE commission_pct IS NOT NAN
select * from test where id > = 1 or name < = 2
select * from test where id < > 1 and name ! = 1 and id ^ = 3
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE MATCH(phone) AGAINST('15111111111')
SELECT * FROM dual v1
select * from t_order where ORDER_ID in 'test'
SELECT RDB$MAP_NAME FROM RDB$AUTH_MAPPING
SELECT T2.Loc.query('.') FROM T CROSS APPLY Instructions.nodes('/root/Location') AS T2(Loc)

SELECT e.[Emp ID], e.SSN, e.FirstName, e.LastName, c.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, c.SYS_CHANGE_CONTEXT FROM Employees AS e CROSS APPLY CHANGETABLE (VERSION Employees, ([Emp ID], SSN), (e.[Emp ID], e.SSN)) AS c;
SELECT id, AI_GENERATE_EMBEDDINGS(large_text USE MODEL MyAzureOpenAIModel) FROM myTable;

SELECT BusinessEntityID, YEAR(QuotaDate) AS SalesYear, SalesQuota AS CurrentQuota, LAG(SalesQuota, 1,0) OVER (ORDER BY YEAR(QuotaDate)) AS PreviousQuota FROM Sales.SalesPersonQuotaHistory WHERE BusinessEntityID = 275 AND YEAR(QuotaDate) IN ('2005','2006');

SELECT BusinessEntityID, YEAR(QuotaDate) AS SalesYear, SalesQuota AS CurrentQuota, LEAD(SalesQuota, 1,0) OVER (ORDER BY YEAR(QuotaDate)) AS NextQuota FROM Sales.SalesPersonQuotaHistory WHERE BusinessEntityID = 275 AND YEAR(QuotaDate) IN ('2005','2006');

SELECT FT_TBL.Description ,KEY_TBL.RANK FROM Production.ProductDescription AS FT_TBL INNER JOIN FREETEXTTABLE(Production.ProductDescription, Description, 'high level of performance', LANGUAGE N'English', 2) AS KEY_TBL ON FT_TBL.ProductDescriptionID = KEY_TBL.[KEY] ORDER BY RANK DESC;
SELECT NCHAR(143743);
SELECT LEFT('abcdefg',2);
SELECT NTILE(4) OVER(ORDER BY SalesYTD DESC) AS Quartile FROM Sales.SalesPerson WHERE TerritoryID IS NOT NULL;
SELECT RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY LocationID ORDER BY Quantity DESC) AS Rank FROM Production.ProductInventory WHERE LocationID BETWEEN 3 AND 4;
SELECT SalesQuota, SUM(SalesYTD) 'TotalSalesYTD', GROUPING(SalesQuota) AS 'Grouping' FROM Sales.SalesPerson GROUP BY SalesQuota WITH ROLLUP;
SELECT REPLACE('This is a Test' COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN, 'Test', 'desk' );

SELECT 'AverageCost' AS CostSortedByProductionDays, [0], [1], [2], [3], [4] FROM (SELECT DaysToManufacture, StandardCost FROM Production.Product) AS SourceTable PIVOT (AVG(StandardCost) FOR DaysToManufacture IN ([0], [1], [2], [3], [4])) AS PivotTable;
SELECT VendorID, Employee, Orders FROM pvt UNPIVOT (Orders FOR Employee IN (Emp1, Emp2, Emp3, Emp4, Emp5)) AS unpvt;
SELECT CURRENT_USER;
SELECT PARSE('Monday, 13 December 2010' AS datetime2 USING 'en-US') AS Result;
SELECT TRY_PARSE('Jabberwokkie' AS datetime2 USING 'en-US') AS Result;
SELECT * FROM msdb.managed_backup.fn_available_backups ('MyDB');
SELECT OrgNode.ToString() AS Text_OrgNode, * FROM HumanResources.EmployeeDemo WHERE OrgNode = hierarchyid::GetRoot();
SELECT STRING_AGG(CONVERT (NVARCHAR (MAX), FirstName), CHAR(13)) AS csv FROM Person.Person;
SELECT position = PATINDEX('%ter%', 'interesting data');

SELECT DISTINCT Name AS DepartmentName, PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ph.Rate) OVER (PARTITION BY Name) AS MedianCont, PERCENTILE_DISC(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ph.Rate) OVER (PARTITION BY Name) AS MedianDisc;
SELECT CONVERT(DATETIME2(0), '2022-03-27T01:01:00', 126) AT TIME ZONE 'Central European Standard Time';
SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY Rate DESC) AS Rank FROM HumanResources.EmployeePayHistory;
SELECT PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY Rate DESC) AS PctRank FROM HumanResources.EmployeePayHistory;
SELECT CUME_DIST () OVER (PARTITION BY Department ORDER BY Rate) AS CumeDist FROM HumanResources.vEmployeeDepartmentHistory;
SELECT * FROM Sales.SalesOrderHeader AS h INNER JOIN Sales.SalesOrderDetail AS d WITH (FORCESEEK) ON h.SalesOrderID = d.SalesOrderID WHERE h.TotalDue > 100;
SELECT p.Name, pr.ProductReviewID FROM Production.Product AS p LEFT OUTER HASH JOIN Production.ProductReview AS pr ON p.ProductID = pr.ProductID
SELECT poh.PurchaseOrderID FROM Purchasing.PurchaseOrderHeader AS poh INNER MERGE JOIN Purchasing.PurchaseOrderDetail AS pod ON poh.PurchaseOrderID = pod.PurchaseOrderID;
SELECT Name , MIN(Rate) OVER (PARTITION BY edh.DepartmentID) FROM HumanResources.EmployeePayHistory
SELECT * INTO [dbo].[FactResellerSalesXL] ON FG2 FROM [dbo].[FactResellerSales];
SELECT counter_name, counter_value FROM sys.dm_external_script_execution_stats WHERE language = 'Python';
SELECT e.BusinessEntityID FROM Employee e WITH (INDEX = 1) INNER JOIN Person pp ON e.BusinessEntityID = pp.BusinessEntityID WHERE pp.LastName = 'Johnson';
SELECT catalog.name, catalog.catalog_id, catalog.database_id FROM sys.dm_fts_active_catalogs catalog WHERE catalog.database_id = DB_ID();

SELECT e.Name, PRODUCT(1 + edh.rateOfReturn) OVER (PARTITION BY e.DepartmentID ORDER BY edh.EffectiveDate) AS CompoundedReturn FROM HumanResources.Employee e JOIN HumanResources.EmployeePayHistory edh ON e.BusinessEntityID = edh.BusinessEntityID;
SELECT DepartmentNumber, DepartmentName FROM DEPARTMENT FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF '2014-01-01' WHERE ManagerID = 5;
SELECT * FROM Sales.Customer TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM(10 PERCENT);
SELECT ProductID, OrderQty FROM Sales.SalesOrderDetail WHERE UnitPrice < 5.00 GROUP BY ProductID, OrderQty OPTION (HASH GROUP, LABEL = N'label1');
SELECT a, b FROM (VALUES (1, 2), (3, 4)) AS MyTable(a, b);
SELECT DATABASEPROPERTYEX('AdventureWorks2022', 'Collation') AS Collation, DATABASEPROPERTYEX('AdventureWorks2022', 'Edition') AS Edition;
SELECT * FROM OPENXML(@idoc, '/ROOT/Customer', 1) WITH (CustomerID VARCHAR(10),ContactName VARCHAR(20));
SELECT r.* FROM VECTOR_SEARCH(TABLE = dbo.sessions AS s, COLUMN = embedding, SIMILAR_TO = @qv, METRIC = 'cosine', TOP_N = 10) AS r;
SELECT Country, Region, SUM(Sales) AS TotalSales FROM Sales GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ( ROLLUP (Country, Region), CUBE (Country, Region));
SELECT IDENTITY(int,1,1) AS ID_Num INTO NewTable FROM OldTable;
SELECT CustomerKey FROM FactInternetSales GROUP BY CustomerKey WITH (DISTRIBUTED_AGG)
SELECT d.*, p.Score FROM PREDICT(MODEL = @model, DATA = dbo.mytable AS d) WITH (Score FLOAT) AS p;
SELECT user_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER w AS 'row_number', RANK() OVER w AS 'rank', DENSE_RANK() OVER w AS 'dense_rank' FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? WINDOW w AS (ORDER BY user_id)
SELECT * FROM Person OPTION (MAXRECURSION 2);
SELECT * FROM Person OPTION ( OPTIMIZE FOR (@city_name = 'Seattle', @postal_code UNKNOWN) );
SELECT * FROM Person OPTION (HASH GROUP, FAST 10);
SELECT * FROM Person OPTION (RECOMPILE, USE HINT ('ASSUME_MIN_SELECTIVITY_FOR_FILTER_ESTIMATES', 'DISABLE_PARAMETER_SNIFFING'));
SELECT * FROM Person OPTION (MAXDOP 2);
SELECT * FROM Person OPTION (FOR TIMESTAMP AS OF '2024-03-13T19:39:35.28');
SELECT * FROM Person OPTION (FORCE SINGLE NODE PLAN);
SELECT * FROM Person OPTION (QUERYTRACEON 4199, QUERYTRACEON 4137);
SELECT 1 AS C1 FROM T_ORDER SAMPLE BLOCK (1.43302, 8) SEED(9) T_ORDER
SELECT * FROM table_func(1, 2)
SELECT INTERVAL 1 DAY FROM t_order
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM t_order GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM foo(1)
SELECT CAST(user_id AS INT) FROM t_order
SELECT GEN_ID(seq, 1) FROM t_order
SELECT GEN_ID(?, ?) FROM t_order
SELECT DEFAULT FROM t_order
SELECT (user_id) FROM t_order
SELECT * FROM schema1.t_order
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id = 1 AND status LIKE 'A%'
SELECT 1 <=> 1
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE id IN (1,2)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE id NOT IN (1,2)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE id NOT BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN 1 END FROM t_order
SELECT CAST(1 AS VARCHAR(10)) FROM t_order
SELECT LOCAL.var FROM t_order
SELECT * FROM t_order a, t_order_item b
SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2
SELECT * FROM (SELECT 1) sub
SELECT * FROM (WITH t AS (SELECT 1) SELECT * FROM t) sub
